headline: The Art of Trump’s Private Equity Deal: Exclusive
summary: By Josh Kosman President Trump in a matter of months turned from a private equity critic to champion and much of that has come because of a deal involving AI, sources told JOBs. Back in February when Trump was threatening to end one of private equity’s big tax loopholes, the treatment of carried interest, leading […] The post The Art of Trump’s Private Equity Deal: Exclusive appeared first on CorpGov.

headline: Apollo Global Q2: Record High Earnings, Strong Momentum
summary: Apollo Global Management posts record Q2 results and leverages retirement and alternative growth, with a pullback offering opportunity. See why APO stock is a buy.
